pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.3_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṁ karontā ekassa chandaṁ adaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.4_0: Atha kho saṅgho “yassatthāya sannipatito taṁ kammaṁ karissāmī”ti ñattiṁ ṭhapesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.6_1: kassa tumhe kammaṁ karissathā”ti chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.9_1: saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.12_2: saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.15.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.6_0: vatthu vā ārocitaṁ hoti avinicchitaṁ, ñatti vā ṭhapitā hoti, kammavācā vā vippakatā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.8_0: “kathaṁ idaṁ kammaṁ kuppaṁ assa vaggaṁ assa na kareyyā”ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.2_0: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.2_0: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti gacchati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.4_0: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṁ karissatī”ti gacchati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.7_0: uccārena vā passāvena vā pīḷito gacchati,
